This is just an installer for Portal UNLEASHED, just use the installer.exe in the ISO or burn the 
ISO onto a DVD.

Includes both start fixes, simple to follow instructions, and the entire game, commentary and all.

Inside the ISO is a readme named index.html, this is for the DVD burn version, but works regardless, just use installer.exe where it says to install using the DVD
